thread.title: BRIEF-BEKO OG intends squeeze-out of Beko Holding AG
thread.title_full: BRIEF-BEKO OG intends squeeze-out of Beko Holding AG

title: BRIEF-BEKO OG intends squeeze-out of Beko Holding AG
text:
BRIEF-BEKO OG intends squeeze-out of Beko Holding AG 
Oct 5 Beko Holding AG : 
* Says Beko Beteiligungsvervaltung OG (BEKO OG) requires transfer of shares held by minority shareholders to principal shareholder against adequate cash compensation 
* At the time of decision on exclusion of minority shareholders, BEKO OG will hold more than 90 pct of voting share capital Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
